question: My mother (65 yrs old), is a type 2 diabetic. She has been doing well on tablets but suddenly has been experiencing severe dizziness especially in the mornings for a few months now. All tests done at the hospital including a blood flow test are normal.The doctor she has been seeing for about a year has not made any adjustment to her tablets and cannot offer any suggestions. A second opinion from another doctor diagnosed her as experiencing a mild stroke and added metformin to her list of tablets which she refused to take because she said they make her worse.Please help....I am highly stressed out over this.Thank you.
title: Severe dizziness -type 2 diabetes
